scripts.ppd:init: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules --scope @metric/acl-init-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/init-project-product-development --stream dev
scripts.ppd:update: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/update-project-product-development --stream dev
scripts.prod-dev:init: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules --scope @metric/acl-init-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/init-product-development --stream dev
scripts.prod-dev:update: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/update-product-development --stream dev
scripts.business-cond:update: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/update-business-conditions --stream dev
scripts.brief:init: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules --scope @metric/acl-init-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/init-brief-product-development --stream dev
scripts.brief:update: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/update-brief-product-development --stream dev
scripts.milestone:init: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules --scope @metric/acl-init-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/init-milestone --stream dev
scripts.milestone:update: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/update-milestone --stream dev
scripts.api:dev: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/acl-api --stream dev
scripts.generic-rabbitmq-kafka: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core build && lerna run --scope @metric/generic-rabbitmq-to-kafka --stream dev
scripts.event: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/business-event-kafka --stream dev
scripts.kafka-prod-dev: lerna run --scope @metric/acl-core --scope @metric/acl-common-modules build && lerna run --scope @metric/product-dev-event-kafka --stream dev
